title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-3.2 - Applicability of subpart
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10 §§ 86-3.2 - Applicability of subpart

State Regulations

The purpose of this Subpart is to implement the legislative requirement that the Commissioner of Health approve rates to be paid by article 44 HMO's to hospitals for inpatient services. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 10
§§
86-3.2

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
